vote.title: Authorize acquisition from IC Properties II, LLC of an unimproved tract of land containing approximately 74,872 square feet near the intersection of Jefferson Boulevard Viaduct and East Colorado Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Project - Not to exceed $1,883,800.00 ($1,871,800.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $12,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
